summary: Completed comprehensive testing of duty scheduler personnel assignment features. Backend APIs working 100% (16/16 tests passed). Frontend UI components mostly functional with one integration issue in assignment creation workflow.

integration_issues.issue: Add Personnels button click does not create assignment blocks in grid
integration_issues.symptoms: Button appears enabled, click registers, but no assignment created and panel remains open

integration_issues.issue: Personnel list sometimes shows 'No available personnel found' after interactions
integration_issues.symptoms: After selecting personnel, list may empty unexpectedly

ui_bugs.issue: Overlay from 'Made with Emergent' badge blocks click interactions
ui_bugs.symptoms: Timeout errors when clicking, requires force=true clicks

passed_tests: Backend: All 8 personnel seeded correctly (6 available, 2 unavailable)
Backend: Personnel filtering by availability works
Backend: Personnel search by callsign/name works
Frontend: Calendar grid loads with existing duties
Frontend: Time cell click opens side panel
Frontend: Side panel displays all required components
Frontend: All Day toggle disables time selectors
Frontend: Personnel search filters results properly
Frontend: Add Personnels button enables/disables appropriately
Frontend: Close button works on side panel

high_priority: Fix assignment creation workflow - button click should create assignment and close panel
Debug why personnel list becomes empty after interactions
Ensure assignment blocks appear in grid after successful creation
medium_priority: Investigate frontend-backend integration for assignment creation
Add error handling/feedback when assignment creation fails
low_priority: Fix overlay issue preventing button clicks (z-index or positioning)
